name: CVOSP
description:
CV Operating System - Professional

Have you ever wanted a miniature operating system that can be run as an app in your current operating system. Well... Probably not, but now that the idea is in your head, you most likely think its a pretty cool idea. As you've probably guessed by now, that's exactly what I did. Meet CVOSP! CVOSP was designed to have a beautiful design, but still be easy to use and relatively lightweight on your computer's resources. It comes with a few unique apps, but more are coming soon! Its free to try, so download it today!
